name: CommonAbnormalitiesCS
title: Foreign Object CodeSystem
description: Foreign object codes defining types of foreign objects observed during a Breast Radiology exam

concept.definition: A foreign object is identified as a BB
A foreign object is identified as a Biopsy Clip
A foreign object is identified as a Titanium Biopsy Clip
A foreign object is identified as a Catheter Sleeve
A foreign object is identified as a Chemotherapy Port
A foreign object is identified as a Coil
A foreign object is identified as a Gun Shot Wound
A foreign object is identified as a Metal
A foreign object is identified as a Metallic Objects
A foreign object is identified as a Needle
A foreign object is identified as a Nipple Jewelery
A foreign object is identified as a Non Metallic Body
A foreign object is identified as a Pace Maker
A foreign object is identified as a Radioactive Pellet
A foreign object is identified as a Sponge
A foreign object is identified as a Surgical Clip
A foreign object is identified as a Swab
A foreign object is identified as a Wire
A foreign object is identified as a Wire Fragment
